tool_description: An API dedicated to The Sandbox metaverse. Get the latest news and price data.
name: The Sandbox - SAND
title: The Sandbox - SAND

api_list.name: Past 1 Week
api_list.description:
Get price data for past 1 week.

~hourly data points.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-sandbox-sand.p.rapidapi.com/market/chart/7d"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-sandbox-sand.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Past 1 Month

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-sandbox-sand.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Year to Date
api_list.description:
Get price data for year to date.

1 day = 5 minute interval data
1 - 90 days = hourly data
above 90 days = daily data (00:00 UTC)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-sandbox-sand.p.rapidapi.com/market/chart/ytd"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-sandbox-sand.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
